菼字的基本解释

菼
tǎn
古书上指荻。

菼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǎn］
［《廣韻》吐敢切，上敢，透。］
初生的荻，似苇而小，茎秆可以编席箔等。

菼字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　菼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1040第13
【唐韻】吐敢切，音毯。【說文】雚之初生。【爾雅·釋草】菼，薍。【註】似葦而小，實中，江東呼爲烏蓲。【詩·王風】毳衣如菼。【箋】毳衣之屬有五色，其靑者如鵻。【傳】郭璞曰：菼草色如鵻，在靑白之閒。【字說】菼，中赤，始生未黑，黑已而赤，故謂之菼，可爲帚。【禮·玉藻·桃茢註】茢菼，帚也。　【說文】作?。或作炎。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】【註】江東呼爲鳥蓲。〕　謹照原文鳥蓲改烏蓲。

菼字的起名意思

古书上指初生的荻。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese characters] 　菼; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1040 to 13
[Tang Yun] Spit and dare to cut, sound blanket. [Said the text] Yu's first birth. 【Erya·Shicao】Cong, Tiao. [Note] It looks like a reed but small, but in reality, Jiangdong is called a black dog. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】Wan Yi is like a bamboo. 【Jan】The genus of velvet clothing has five colors, and its scorpion is like a scorpion. [Biography] Guo Pu said: The color of the green grass is like 鵻, and it is leisurely in the white. 【Words】Chinese 輼, mid-red, the beginning of life is not black, black is red, so it is called 輼, can be broom. 【Li·Yuzao·Peach Chopsticks】Chopsticks, brooms also.　[Said the text] for?. Or make inflammation. Textual research: [[Erya·Shucao] [Note] Jiangdong is called a bird. 〕　I would like to change the original bird to the black.
